t: Rock Painting Supplies
s: In other words, they are perfect for Mandala Art. I use ball stylus pens for MORE than Mandalas, though. I use them to embellish my rocks with tiny dots, and I use them for certain designs such as stars, flowers, and more. They are also handy for drawing fine lines, filling in small details with paint, or creating texture. These usually come in sets, and each pen has two sizes of ball tips (one on each end). I got my set on Amazon...
